missing.title: Oops, looks like something is missing.
missing.detail: An error has occurred and we are working to fix the problem.

invalidCompanyId.title: Sorry, looks like this url is invalid.
invalidCompanyId.detail: The url that you are trying to access is invalid, please check the url and try again.

companyNotFound.title: Company not found.
companyNotFound.detail: The company that you are looking for either does not exist or is unavailable.

general.title: Sorry, something went wrong.
general.detail: An error has occurred and we are working to fix the problem.

requestLimit.title: You have exceeded your rate limit.
requestLimit.detail: This service has a request rate limit and it has now been reached. Please try again later.
